message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.Distributed Systems, cs.OS, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper discusses the convergence of grid computing and P2P computing, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC). The evaluation of scalability and performance of P2P tools for discovering and registering services is related to network infrastructure (cs.NI). The study of protocols for creating a decentralised middleware for desktop grid involves distributed systems (cs.Distributed Systems) and operating systems (cs.OS). Finally, the analysis of publish-subscribe systems is related to system design and control (cs.SY).
